RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 1 5 1/2F Turf CR: 84. Maiden Special Weight Purse 136500. (PURSE $105,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $23,751 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five and One Half Furlongs on the Main Track).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CIGALE broke out then bumped with a foe, settled while last but one, was urged along coming to the seven-sixteenths pole, went two then three wide on the turn, swung six wide into the stretch, rallied outside under a right-handed crop into the final furlong and closed fast to get up in the final two strides. REVEREND MOON showed speed between horses, was taken back off the pace outside the seven-sixteenths, came under encouragement in the two path on the turn, gained three wide under a drive into the stretch, took over inside the three-sixteenths, shook clear inside the furlong marker, remained clear into the final sixteenth, led until the final strides but was denied while clear for the place. IRISH GENT (IRE) bumped with a rival at the start, was well placed while urged along off the pace, saved ground on the turn, angled out behind bumping foes in upper stretch and finished willingly for the show. HARD PAR bumped lightly with a foe near the nine-sixteenths, went three wide on the turn, came four wide into the stretch and lacked the needed response. SONOFASHIP was hustled to the front, contested the pace on the inside of opponents, vied along the hedge on the turn, bumped with VESTURE in upper stretch and tired. VESTURE bumped with a rival after the start, moved up on the outside to contest the pace, vied in the three then two path on the turn, bumped with SONOFASHIP in upper stretch and tired. SANDERSON bumped lightly with a rival near the nine-sixteenths, raced between horses in the two path on the turn, was roused outside the quarter-pole, spun three wide into the stretch, steadied while having his path taken nearing the furlong marker and came up empty. PATRIOT HILLS bumped with a rival at the start, settled at the rear, moved from the rail to the two path on the turn, spun three wide into the stretch and failed to threaten.

ENTRY.NAME: Patriot Hills
ENTRY.OWNER: Roman Lawrence P Garvey Charles and Tremblay Norman
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start,settled,ins-2p turn,3p1/4,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Irish Gent (IRE)
ENTRY.OWNER: Low, Lawana L. and Robert E.
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,well placed,urged,ins turn,angled out 3/16,willingly 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Sonofaship
ENTRY.OWNER: Paradise Farms Corp Staudacher David and Norman Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,pace inside foes,hedge turn,bmpd ins 3/16,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Sanderson
ENTRY.COMMENT: mild bump 4-1/2,btwn 2p turn,3p1/4,steadied1/8,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Hard Par
ENTRY.OWNER: Adelphi Racing Club Dark Horse Racing Stable MacWilliams Patrick O and Cutair Ra
ENTRY.COMMENT: light bump 4-1/2,3wide turn,4w into lane,lacked needed response

ENTRY.NAME: Reverend Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed btwn,tkn back7/16,ask 2p turn,3p1/4,lead ins3/16,denied

ENTRY.NAME: Cigale
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out,bmpd,settled,2-3p turn,6p1/4,rallied outside,clsd fast,up

ENTRY.NAME: Vesture
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd after brk,mvd up,outside pace,3-2p,bmpd ins 3/16,tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 79. Maiden Special Weight Purse 88000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MY MANE SQUEEZE three then two wide in aim of the leader, came under coaxing and took over command at the five-sixteenths, spun two to three wide into upper stretch, drew clear under a drive kept to task. DOLOMITE just off the pace along the inside early on, was placed in tight by PERFECTLY MPERFECT due to pressure from POSEIDON'S MIST, then got forced to check out along the rail off the heels of that rival when POSEIDON'S MIST came over some more before her rider peered back and lost about two to three lengths of position as a result, altered to the two path before going three wide into the turn, came under light coaxing nearing the five-sixteenths and tipped out four wide as POSEIDON'S MIST tipped out in front at that station, swung four to five wide into upper stretch escaping that rival and showed good courage to rally and secure the place honors clear of the rest and along second best. CAROL T coaxed from the gate, chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun three then two wide straightened away into upper stretch and weakened while along for the show honors. MUNNY GRAB a bit fractious in the gate prior to the start, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four to five wide into upper stretch before tipping out two to three additional paths as POSEIDON'S MIST drifted out in front, then passed tired rivals to the finish. POSEIDON'S MIST broke in at the start bumping PERFECTLY MPERFECT, chased just off the inside coming in slightly and placing that same rival in tight while forcing DOLOMITE to check inside that rival five furlongs from home, chased just off the inside coming under coaxing near the five-sixteenths, the rider peeking back before tipping out in the path of DOLOMITE at that station forcing that rival to go four wide, swung four wide into upper stretch, drifted out two to three paths straightened away and tired. PERFECTLY MPERFECT got bumped at the start by the aforementioned foe, chased just off the inside and was placed in tight near the five-eighths by that same rival pausing briefly before resuming the chase now along the rail, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and tired. WISE CONVERSATION five paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked to the two path through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun two to three wide into upper stretch and made no impact. SNARKY broke out at the start and was corrected, showed the way in hand just off the inside, tucked inside into the turn, came under coaxing midway under challenge to the outside, yielded the front with five-sixteenths to go, took the inside route into upper stretch and folded. MOTHER MARY five paths off the inside early on, tucked three wide at the nine-sixteenths before going to the inside into the turn, came under coaxing three furlongs from home, continued along the inside into upper stretch and made no impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Dolomite
ENTRY.COMMENT: ins, checked 5/8, 3w turn, alter 4w 5/16, 4-5w uppr, gd courage

ENTRY.NAME: Perfectly Mperfect
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 2p, ins turn, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Poseidon's Mist
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, 2p, put foes in tight 5/8, tip 3w 5/16, 4w 1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Munny Grab
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit fractious gate, chased 3-2w, 4-5w uppr, passed tired foes

ENTRY.NAME: Carol T
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 5/16, 3-2w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Snarky
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, in hand 2p, to ins 1/2, yielded 5/16, ins 1/4, folded

ENTRY.NAME: Wise Conversation
ENTRY.OWNER: Witz Frank Rodriguez Rudy R Beadnell Anthany and Beadnell Susan
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w backstretch, 2p turn, coaxed 3/8, 2-3w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: My Mane Squeeze
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3-2w in aim, took over coaxed 5/16, 2-3w upper, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Mother Mary
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w early, tucked 3w 9/16, coaxed ins 3/8, ins 1/4, no impact

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 100000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $45,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $45,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment D ue At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SECURITY CODE was backed out of the gate then reloaded, broke out and bumped with a foe then was taken up with tugs of the left-rein, spotted the front a few lengths, moved up under urging, was put to stronger encouragement while trying to establish position inside a cavalcade of rivals at the half-mile pole, bumped with SHESAWILDJOKER shortly thereafter, maintained position into the turn, vied along the rail on that bend, battled with FANCY JOKE under a drive in upper stretch, disposed of that opponent while drifting out outside the sixteenth-pole and drew away to prevail. RIBOT'S VALENTINE chased the pace, bumped with a rival near the half-mile pole, vied four wide on the turn, dropped back nearing the five-sixteenths, remained on her inside lead while keeping on in the stretch and got up for the place. KHALI MAGIC bumped with a rival at the start, was urged along off the pace, steadied briefly inside the nine-sixteenths, was taken in hand while off heels into the turn, came under urging while dropping from four to three wide on that bend, moved closer to the rail in the stretch and missed the place while able to get the show. FANCY JOKE sped to a clear early lead then was taken in hand, was engulfed by the rest of the field coming to the half-mile pole, bumped with foes on both sides shortly thereafter, had a rival clip her heels near the seven-sixteenths, vied in the two path on the turn, battled outside the winner under a drive in upper stretch, lost touch with that foe outside the sixteenth-pole then swapped back to her inside lead and weakened then was caught for the trifecta. SILVER FIST brushed with a rival at the start, chased the pace, angled out nearing the half-mile pole then bumped with foes, vied in the three path on the turn, dropped back while remaining on her inside lead in upper stretch, swapped to the proper lead at the furlong marker and tired. OK HONEY was hustled from the gate, chased the pace on the outside, avoided the bumping skirmish to her inside leaving the backstretch, went five wide on the turn and came up empty. SHESAWILDJOKER chased the pace, gained fast on the leader nearing the half-mile pole, bumped with foes on both sides while the field was too tightly bunched into the turn then checked, clipped the heels of a foe and stumbled near the seven-sixteenths nearly unseating the rider, had the jockey regain balance outside the three-eighths pole, saved ground on the turn, moved out in the stretch and had nothing left. FOLLOWING AN OBJECTION BY THE RIDER OF SHESAWILDJOCKER AND A STEWARDS' INQUIRY INTO THE INCIDENT LATE ON THE BACKSTRETCH AND INTO THE TURN, NO CHANGE WAS MADE TO THE ORDER OF FINISH

ENTRY.NAME: Shesawildjoker
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace,bmpd btwn 1/2,bounced around,checked,clip heels,faltr

ENTRY.NAME: Security Code
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out,bmp,tkn up,mvd up,bmpd1/2,ins turn,drift out last1/8,clr

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Rockridge Stud, LLC, Ascendant Farms,LLC & Godolphin

ENTRY.NAME: Khali Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,urgd along,stdy ins4-1/2,off heels7/16,4-3p turn,miss2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Silver Fist
ENTRY.COMMENT: brshd brk,chsd,angled out1/2,bmpd,3path turn,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Fancy Joke
ENTRY.COMMENT: clear early,in hand,bmpd btwn 1/2,clip behind7/16,2p turn,wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Ribot's Valentine
ENTRY.OWNER: Adelphi Racing Club and Blue Streak Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace,bmpd1/2,4w turn,drop back5/16,kept on,up 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Ok Honey
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,chased outside,5wide turn,empty

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Saranac S. - Grade3 SARATOGA RACE 4 1 1/16M Inner turf CR: 105. Stakes Purse 175000. INNER TURF FOR THREE YEAR OLDS.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CARL SPACKLER (IRE) forwardly placed just off the inside, tracked the leader in closest aim latched on at times three wide down the backstretch, tucked back to the two path through the far turn, continued just off the inside into upper stretch, came under hand urging and seized command nearing the eighth pole, edged clear and was lightly hand urged through the final sixteenth to the finish. TAKING CANDY coaxed from the gate, established the front and showed the way in hand along the inside through moderate splits, came under coaxing nearing the quarter pole and continued in the inside route into upper stretch, dug in under threat and was collared nearing the eighth pole, ran on to preserve the place honors. LOST ARK three wide early on, tucked to the two path near the seven-eighths before tucking inside into the first turn forcing YACOWLEF to steady off his heels, tracked just off the inside down the backstretch and into the far turn coming under coaxing three furlongs from home between rivals, continued just off the inside into upper stretch, kept on under a drive to secure the show honors. MENDELSSOHNS MARCH coaxed along early on soon after the start, chased just off the inside through the first turn and then three to four wide thereafter, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch and stayed on one paced through to the finish. YACOWLEF (IRE) tracked along the inside growing rank against the bit while under rating hold past the stands the first time, got steadied off the heels of LOST ARK as that foe tucked directly in front just outside six and a half furlongs to run, pulled a bit keen under rating into the backstretch tracking along the hedge, got given a notch to work with and pulled his way advancing inside from the nine-sixteenths into striking range into the far turn, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and cut the corner into upper stretch, then tired through to the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Taking Candy
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand ins,coaxed near 1/4, ins 1/4, collared, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Carl Spackler (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed 2p, tracked 3-2w, 2w 1/4p, up near 1/8, edged cl

ENTRY.NAME: Yacowlef (IRE)

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of GOO

ENTRY.COMMENT: steady into 1st turn, tracked ins, coaxed 1/4, cut corner, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Mendelssohns March
ENTRY.OWNER: Harold Lerner LLC Nehoc Stables AWC Stables and Team Stallion Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed early, 2p 1st turn, chased 3-4w, 3w upper, one paced

ENTRY.NAME: Lost Ark
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2p, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, kept on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 79. Maiden Special Weight Purse 136500. (PURSE $105,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $23,751 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOCKED bumped with a rival at the start then was hustled, prompted the pace on the outside in the three path, took the lead passing the seven-sixteenths then moved clear approaching the three-eighths pole, continued around the far turn in the three path, dropped to the two path at the quarter-pole, remained clear under a solid hand-ride into the final furlong, extended the advantage while flagged with the crop into the final sixteenth and proved much the best under a brisk hand-ride from that point to the finish. DRUM ROLL PLEASE was hustled from the gate, went two to three wide on the first turn, was well placed just off the pace, chased in the two path on the far turn, was driven three wide into the stretch, pursued the winner in the drive and proved no match but was well clear for the place. STURDY bumped very hard with a rival at the start then was slow into stride, went around the first turn in the two path, settled near the back, was urged while moving from the two path to the four path on the far turn, came six wide into the stretch and was along for the show. HAMILTON'S WAY bobbled at the start then bumped with a foe, settled on the inside, moved off the rail under urging inside the three-eighths pole, jostled with a foe while between horses at the five-sixteenths and came up empty. GOLDEN PLATE bumped very hard with a rival while being bumped by another foe at the start then checked, spotted the front many lengths, raced in the three path on the first turn, raced at the rear, moved from the inside to the three path on the far turn, spun four wide into the stretch, angled out inside the three-sixteenths and failed to threaten. RESILIENCE hit the inside of the gate at the start, went six wide early on the first turn, dropped to the three path later on that bend, settled off the pace, was urged while moving from the rail to the three path on the far turn, jostled with a rival while between horses at the five-sixteenths and had nothing left. FLASHY FAST went five then four wide on the first turn, settled on the outside, was asked while three then four wide on the far turn, came five wide into the stretch and failed to respond. RIGHT TO VOTE traveled five then four wide on the first turn, climbed late on that bend, settled well off the pace, moved from three to five wide on the far turn and was no factor. TORNADO ROAD broke out then was corrected by the rider, dropped from the seven path to the five path on the first turn, settled on the outside, dropped back in the two path on the far turn and faltered. ARTETA broke out and bumped with a rival, went to the front, showed the way on the inside with company to his outside, lost the lead at the seven-sixteenths and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Arteta
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,bmpd,to front,inside pace,headed7/16,stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Plate
ENTRY.OWNER: Fern Circle Stables and Gainesway Stable (Antony Beck)
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmp hrd brk,chckd,3p1st,well back,ins-3p2nd,4w1/4,angld,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Sturdy
ENTRY.OWNER: Repole Stable and R A Hill Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd very hard brk,2p1st,well back,2-4p2nd turn,6w1/4,up3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Hamilton's Way
ENTRY.OWNER: West Paces Racing LLC and Hoffman Thoroughbreds
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled brk,bmpd,settled inside,2path ins 3/8,jostled5/16,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Locked
ENTRY.OWNER: Eclipse Thoroughbred Partners and Walmac Farm
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmp brk,hustled,3p1st,outside pace,lead7/16,3p,clr3/8,2p1/4,drvng

ENTRY.NAME: Drum Roll Please
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,2-3p1st,well placed,chased 2p2nd,3p1/4,no match,clr2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Flashy Fast
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5-4p1st,settled outside,ask 3-4w2nd turn,5w1/4,no response

ENTRY.NAME: Right to Vote
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5-4p1st,climbed6-1/2,well off pace,3-5w2nd turn,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Resilience
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate,6-3p1st,settled,ins-3p2nd turn,jostled 5/16,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Tornado Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,7-5w1st,settled outside,drop back 2p2nd,faltered

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 78. Maiden Special Weight Purse 88000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UNICORN CAKE coaxed from the gate, chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive surging in the late stages to just get up in the final jump brushing with FOCUS POCUS, who came out in the late going and was up to score on the wire. FOCUS POCUS got bumped askew at the start by the veering in MISS MAXIMUS, vied from the three path early on among a quintet and then a trio before emerging with sole command tucked to the two path half a mile from home, showed the way patiently handled through the turn and was set down spinning just off the inside into upper stretch, edged clear under a drive to the eighth pole, dug in under lone threat and came outwards to look her main danger in the eye brushing with that rival when getting nailed at the finish. EKWANOK coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside down the backstretch and then three to four wide through the turn under coaxing from the three-eighths, went five to six wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild kick to secure the show honors in the final jumps. CALL HER BLUFF chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch, kicked on belatedly to secure the last major share. MISS MAXIMUS veered in at the start bumping FOCUS POCUS, vied early on before chasing three wide, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch, kept on to the finish but was outfinished in the late stages. MIDNIGHT CONCERTO got away to an awkward start and was a beat slower then the field, chased three then two wide detached at the tail of the field coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung five wide into upper stretch and rallied to close in late. STORMY DISCO chased four paths off the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch and weakened. REGENERATOR six paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four to five wide into upper stretch and made no impact. MOON CHARIOT chased just off the inside under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, made no impact. MY KINDA MISCHIEF vied from the two path early on before chasing along the inside, continued in the inside route into upper stretch, faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Ekwanok
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, coaxed 3-4w 3/8, 5-6w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: My Kinda Mischief
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2p, coaxed inside 3/8, inside 1/4, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Focus Pocus
ENTRY.OWNER: Brady Horse Racing and Rusba V Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, vied 3p early, in hand 2p, 2w 1/4p, clear, nailed

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Concerto
ENTRY.OWNER: Harold Lerner LLC AWC Stables and Nehoc Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 7/16, 5w upper, rallied

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Maximus
ENTRY.COMMENT: veered in st, vied early, chased 3w, 4w uppr,kept on, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Moon Chariot
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 7/16, inside 1/4, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Stormy Disco
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4w backstretch, 2p turn, 3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Unicorn Cake
ENTRY.OWNER: Flower City Racing LLC Meyer Christopher J and Spiesman Rich
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 5-4w, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, late surge, up

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Flower City Racing LLC, Christopher JMeyer & Rich Spiesman

ENTRY.NAME: Call Her Bluff
ENTRY.OWNER: Rodriguez Rudy R Flying Zee Racing Stables LLC and LaBelle Tracey L
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 5-4w, coaxed 5/16, 6w upper, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Regenerator
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6w backstretch, 3w turn, coaxed 3/8, 4-5w upper, no impact

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 7 1 1/16M Inner turf CR: 94. Allowance Purse 149500. INNER TURF (PURSE $115,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $26,013 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: QUARREL had a rival clip his heels near the seven-eighths pole, raced inside to the two path on the first turn, showed the way down the backstretch, vied inside on the far turn, was challenged at the five-sixteenths, easily disposed of that foe into upper stretch, extended the advantage into the final furlong then came under a right-handed crop and held under steady urging. SWOOP TO FINISH saved ground on the first turn, settled towards the rear, moved closer while two then three wide on the far turn, was asked for her best in upper stretch, chased the winner in the final furlong, gained on that foe into the final sixteenth and finished with good courage but missed while clear for the place. EXPAND THE MAP (IRE) moved in early, went around the first turn in the two path, was reserved off the pace, rallied three then two wide on the final turn, made a bid outside the winner at the five-sixteenths, dropped back into upper stretch and weakened but just held the show. STEPHANIE'S CHARM clipped the heels of the winner near the seven-eighths pole, was rated on the inside, turned into the stretch in the two path, moved out outside the furlong marker and lacked the needed kick then just missed the show. I'M SO SORRY raced in hand while between foes on the first turn, was reserved at the back, went three then four wide while let out on the far turn, bumped with an opponent at the five-sixteenths and lacked the needed response. RHOMBIQUE hit the outside of the gate at the start, went three wide on the first turn, settled on the outside, went four then five wide on the far turn, bumped with a foe at the five-sixteenths and failed to rally. DEAR LADY stalked the pace on the outside in the two path, came up empty on the far turn and dropped out.

ENTRY.NAME: Quarrel
ENTRY.COMMENT: clipped behind 7/8,ins-2p1st,easy lead,ins2nd,responded,held

ENTRY.NAME: Rhombique
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate,3w1st,settled outside,4-5w2nd,bmpd5/16,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Stephanie's Charm
ENTRY.COMMENT: clipped heels7/8,rated inside,2p1/4,mvd out ins3/16,missed3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Swoop to Finish
ENTRY.COMMENT: ins1st,settled,2-3p2nd,chased winner,gained,good courage,missed

ENTRY.NAME: Dear Lady
ENTRY.OWNER: Fowler Barry and Magdalena Racing (Sherri McPeek)
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p1st,stalked outside,empty 2p2nd turn,dropped out

ENTRY.NAME: I'm So Sorry
ENTRY.OWNER: Pura Vida Investments LLC Hutson Cindy M Romano Thomas J and Werner William K
ENTRY.COMMENT: btwn2p1st turn,reserved,3-4w2nd,bmpd5/16,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Expand the Map (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: mvd in,2p1st,reserved,rally3-2p2nd,bid5/16,drop back3/16,wknd

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of ASC

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 8 7F Dirt CR: 87. Claiming Purse 45000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FORCED RANKING three then two wide in aim of the leader, advanced in tandem with GUN MAESTRO on the leader into the turn, seized command with seven-sixteenths to go and tucked inside midway on the turn, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, came under brief threat to the outside at the three-sixteenths before shaking off that rival to edge away under a drive kept to task. RUN SMITTY RUN seven paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked inside six furlongs from home, tipped two then three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, went nine wide into upper stretch and kicked on belatedly to secure the place honors. AMERICAN LAW got bumped between foes and forced to steady after the start conceding three to four lengths to the front, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went six to seven wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild kick. MORNING CUP came out slightly after the start bumping AMERICAN LAW in tandem with PINE VALLEY, chased two to three wide until tipped out five wide midway on the turn, swung four wide into upper stretch, offered up a bid at the three-sixteenths, then weakened in the late stages. HATCH chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, continued two to three wide into upper stretch, weakened in the late going. FIGHT FIERCELY chased five to six paths off the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn under coaxing from the three-eighths, went eight wide into upper stretch and offered no response. IMPROPER chased five then four wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, swung five wide into upper stretch, tired. PINE VALLEY came in slightly after the start under hustling and bumped AMERICAN LAW in concert with MORNING CUP, got hustled along showing the way along the inside, yielded the front with seven-sixteenths to go, continued in the inside route into upper stretch and tired. BASIS RISK broke in at the start bumping GUN MAESTRO and was forced to steady conceding four lengths to the front before settling into stride, chased five to six paths off the inside down the backstretch and then four wide through the turn, went five wide for home and made no impact. GUN MAESTRO got bumped at the start by the aforementioned foe, chased four wide in aim before advancing on the leader in tandem with FORCED RANKING tucking three then two wide before coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, faded and went four wide into upper stretch, then gave way through to the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Morning Cup
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2-3w, tipped 5w 3/8, 4w upper, bid 3/16, wknd late

ENTRY.COMMENT: bump btw, steady after st, chased 3-2w, 6-7w upper, mild kick

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 9 5 1/2F Turf CR: 97. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 100000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $45,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $45,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five and One Half Furlongs on the Main Track).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VACATION DANCE was coaxed along off the pace, dropped back while taken in hand late on the backstretch, saved ground on the turn, moved out while put to a drive in upper stretch, rallied outside to get the lead outside the sixteenth-pole then moved clear under steady handling. ME 'N SAP was urged along on the outside, went three wide on the turn, came five wide into the stretch and finished willingly for the place. WINNERS LAUGH bumped hard with a rival at the start, settled on the outside, ranged up four wide on the turn, was asked outside the quarter-pole, chased under a drive into the final furlong then made a bid, battled into the final sixteenth and was outfinished then just missed the place while narrowly able to get the show. FEATHERS ROAD was off slow and spotted the front a few lengths, raced at the rear under reserve, shifted from three to five wide on the turn, moved out in upper stretch and improved position to just miss the trifecta. KING MOONRACER broke a step slow, settled towards the rear, moved from the hedge to the four path on the turn, came six wide into the turn and also improved position then missed the superfecta. BAR FOURTEEN settled off the pace, raced between horses in the two path on the turn, spun three wide into the stretch then moved further out and lacked the needed kick. DISARMED settled off the pace, rounded the turn in the two path, was asked at the quarter-pole, chased between horses with some room in front in upper stretch, brushed with foes in the process, lacked room when the leader wobbled out at the furlong marker, steadied some while altering out behind horses coming to the sixteenth-pole and missed the superfecta. DISCO DEANO showed speed between horses, dropped back late on the backstretch, chased in the three path on the turn, brushed with a rival while chasing in upper stretch, made a bid inside the furlong marker but weakened. SAINT SELBY bumped hard with a rival at the start then was hustled, showed speed on the outside, led in the two path on the turn, dropped closer to the hedge in upper stretch, wobbled out some near the furlong marker and was overtaken. ICY FLAVOR was hustled from the gate, showed speed inside foes then dropped back late on the backstretch, saved ground on the turn, waited while stymied behind horses in the stretch, had a sliver of room in the final sixteenth but didn't come through while remaining in hand and lost any chance.

ENTRY.NAME: Icy Flavor
ENTRY.OWNER: Donald R Dizney LLC and Strauss William
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,speed ins,rail turn,stymied stretch,lost chance

ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed,in hand7/16,drp back,ins turn,mvd out 3/16,rallied,clear

ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow,towards rear,ins-4w turn,6w1/4,improved

ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,btwn foes 2p turn,3p1/4,mvd out,lacked needed kick

ENTRY.COMMENT: settld,2p trn,ask1/4,chsd,lckd room1/8,alter1/16,miss super

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 10 1M Dirt CR: 89. Claiming Purse 35000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BROOKLYN DIAMONDS broke out at the start and was bumped by SOUNDS SPOOKY due to pressure from EXCESS DEMAND and bobbled before coming in brush with INSPECTOR, chased three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled out six wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive coming inwards and brushed with JUSTICE DEPARTMENT a sixteenth from home, then got up in the final jumps to score when collaring a leg weary leader at the end. DEPUTY CONNECT coaxed from the gate, raced four then three wide in aim of the leader, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, advanced to take command nearing the quarter pole, swung three wide into upper stretch, edged clear under a drive to the eighth pole, grew leg weary inside the final sixteenth and was caught in the last strides to the finish. JUSTICE DEPARTMENT coaxed from the start, chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung five wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive and was brushed by BROOKLYN DIAMONDS near the sixteenth pole, ran on to secure the show honors. INSPECTOR chased two to three wide, was under brief coaxing when bumped between foes just outside the five-sixteenths, cornered two to three wide for home, offered up a bid but was outfinished in the late stages. BOLD LOOKER chased three to four wide detached at the tail of the field, tucked to the two path into the far turn, came under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch before tipping out two to three additional paths and kicked on belatedly to the finish. STRONG LIGHT just off the inside near the rear of the field, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled four wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild bid. MAYFIELD STRONG chased along the inside under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, weakened. SCOTTO chased along the inside under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, tired. EXCESS DEMAND broke in at the start bumping SOUNDS SPOOKY into BROOKLYN DIAMONDS, established the front and showed the way in hand just off the inside, was under challenge and placed to coaxing at the three-eighths, yielded the front nearing the quarter pole, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and tired. SOUNDS SPOOKY got bumped between foes at the start, chased six then five wide under coaxing from the half mile pole, went seven wide into upper stretch and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Scotto
ENTRY.OWNER: Cipriano Vito Scotti Neil Alfleri Anthony and Bochilo Vincent
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 7/16, 2w 1/4p, tired
